lead_paragraph: The bank cut the chief executive’s cash bonus and paid its top executives largely in stock awards tied to the company’s performance.

headline.print_headline: JPMorgan’s C.E.O. Got a 35% Raise in 2015, to $27 Million
headline.main: Jamie Dimon’s Compensation at JPMorgan Chase Rises 35%, to $27 Million

snippet: The bank cut the chief executive’s cash bonus and paid its top executives largely in stock awards tied to the company’s performance.
abstract: JPMorgan Chase paid chairman and chief executive Jamie Dimon $27 million in 2015, up 35 percent from his 2014 compensation; package was narrowly approved by shareholders.
